name: edgars-mobile-auto-shop
description: Monorepo root for Edgar’s Mobile Auto Shop — backend (Flask) + frontend (Vite React).

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.seed: docker compose exec -T db psql -U $POSTGRES_USER -d $POSTGRES_DB < backend/seeds/seed_s1.sql
scripts.verify:db: docker compose exec db psql -U $POSTGRES_USER -d $POSTGRES_DB -c "select enum_range(null::appointment_status);"
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: cross-env SKIP_KILL_5173=1 start-server-and-test 'npm run dev:frontend' http://localhost:5173 'playwright test --config=playwright-smoke.config.ts'
scripts.test:browsers: cross-env SKIP_KILL_5173=1 start-server-and-test 'npm run dev:frontend' http://localhost:5173 'playwright test --config=playwright-smoke.config.ts --project=chromium --project=firefox --project=webkit'
